title: 'My mother is deeply entrenched in anti-vaccine conspiracies': what it's really like growing up with anti-vax parents
text:
“I was curious more than anything,'' explains 23-year-old Sarah*. “I was a child when she first told me, so I had many questions. I wasn't angry about not being vaccinated but I was very interested in my mother's reasoning.”

At the age of seven, Sarah was informed by her mother that she hadn’t been given the MMR vaccine.

“My oldest sibling had the MMR vaccine and later developed Guillain-Barré syndrome (a rare condition that affects the nerves in the body),” she explains.

According to NHS England, the causes of Guillain-Barré syndrome are multifaceted, the chances of developing the syndrome after having a vaccination are extremely low and the benefits of being vaccinated vastly outweigh the...
description: “I was curious more than anything,'' explains 23-year-old Sarah*.
